mapper.update: update tb_quan set batchnum = #{batchnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cid = #{cid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, syr = #{syr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hxsj = #{hxsj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sendtime = #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, usetime = #{usetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expiretime = #{expiretime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, batchnum, cid, syr,hxsj, status, sendtime, usetime, starttime,expiretime, created, updated from tb_quan
